column1: Geospatial Sciences (Geographic Information Science and Computing) MSc
Department of Civil, Environmental & Geomatic Engineering

Register your interest in study at UCLThe Geospatial Sciences (GIS and Computing) MSc teaches students the theory, tools and techniques for working with geospatial data, from acquisition to processing to analysis. Students have the opportunity to engage and work with academics and industrial partners on cutting-edge research through seminars and a dissertation.
1 year full time, 2 years part time
